title: Font ID FF Qtype Extended
content:
Can somebody please ID this font,

could it be FF Qtype Extended  
other suggestions please,

thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234817im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ell_6222.jpg)

 [‹ Typeface ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234817/http:/typophile.com/node/40023 "Go to previous forum topic") [who knows – masters? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234817/http:/typophile.com/node/40045 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Raf

comments.content:
Hi Raf,  
I’d say [Bank Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234817/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=bank+gothic).  
But: yes, an image would help.  
F

Florian, Bank Gothic looks cooler ;-)  
All that does have a neat Dulles Airport or _2001: A Space Odyssey_ feel to it.

<cite>Florian, Bank Gothic looks cooler ;-)</cite>  
@Dan: Yeah, [I know](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234817/http:/www.linotype.com/184368/morrissans-family.html). ;-)  
That was just a shot in the dark, before the image was added.

There are similar ultra-geometric faces in The Foundry’s [Architype series](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234817/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_architype_2/archi_2.html). But that rounded ‘U’ says crappy freeware, to me.

Aggie comes very close,

thanks guys !
